topic.title: zeronet newbie here
topic.body: Hey! Any method for setting zeronet to open in tor automatically without setting tor as the default browser?

1_19QUk6wDdk8hSNPGa85GtsZD5yApSzPem6.body: Thanks. Yeah, I meant using the tor browser, not tor enabled in firefox. But I set zeronet as homepage in tor browser, guess that gets the job done without having to set the tor browser as default
